response.overview: After the death of his family in an accident, Ah Jun decides to return to his hometown with his dependent granddaughter, and decides to revive the unfulfilled dream of the band when he was young. Ah Jun then sets out to find his bandmates, the first of whom is Shaolin, who runs a kopitiam with his wife, Ah Zhen. Knowing that Ah Chun wants to reorganize the band, Shaolin immediately agrees to do so.
response.title: Le Dream
